config.incrementing.column.name: ID
config.query: select * from (select distinct FA.CUST_LN_NBR,FA.ID FROM flex_activity FA,credit_lines CL WHERE FA.CUST_LN_NBR = CL.CUST_LINE_NBR AND CL.APPLID IN ('CAD') OR CL.APPLID_LOAN IN ('LN')OR CL.credit_line_status  = '0'OR FA.POSTDT = (SELECT MAX(POSTDT) FROM flex_fee_activity ffa)AND CUST_LN_NBR NOT LIKE '%IMX%' LIMIT 1) test
